law.text:
The Department may not issue a hauler certificate to transport a low-level nuclear waste unless:
The applicant files with the Department acceptable evidence of a bond or other security as required under § 7-252 of this subtitle;
The applicant agrees not to transport any low-level nuclear waste unless the receiving low-level nuclear waste facility has been notified and has indicated its capability and willingness to take the low-level nuclear waste; and
The Department finds that the applicant is qualified to meet and capable of meeting the requirements of this subtitle.
